query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `report_schedules` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `projectId` int NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `frequency` enum('weekly', 'monthly') NOT NULL,
  `recipients` text NOT NULL,
  `config` json NOT NULL,
  `nextRunAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `lastRunAt` timestamp NULL,
  `enabled` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_userId` (`userId`),
  INDEX `idx_projectId` (`projectId`),
  INDEX `idx_nextRunAt` (`nextRunAt`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4LxBqKfHv1LE9mk.f65588d6698e --database XpSHcSiEisTmX38X46V9tQ --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `report_schedules` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `projectId` int NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `frequency` enum('weekly', 'monthly') NOT NULL,
  `recipients` text NOT NULL,
  `config` json NOT NULL,
  `nextRunAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `lastRunAt` timestamp NULL,
  `enabled` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_userId` (`userId`),
  INDEX `idx_projectId` (`projectId`),
  INDEX `idx_nextRunAt` (`nextRunAt`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
